title: Each county to determine its own number of fire
context: ยง46-13 Each county to determine its own number of fire stations. Any other provisions of law to the contrary notwithstanding, the council of each county, may determine the number of fire stations it will establish and maintain within its respective county. [L 1962, c 2, ยง2; Supp, ยง138-46; HRS ยง46-13]
